articles.title: New AI Method Can Find Tiny Traces of Cancer in Blood Samples
articles.description: A new AI method can detect even the tiniest traces of tumor DNA in blood samples, helping doctors to track if a cancer treatment is working.
articles.content: Researchers at the A*STAR Genome Institute of Singapore (A*STAR GIS) have developed a new way of tracking circulating tumor DNA (ctDNA) in small blood samples using artificial intelligence (AI). The team reports that this new AI method, called “Fragl... [3407 chars]

articles.title: WhatsApp introduces first major advertising features
articles.description: Those who only use WhatsApp for personal messaging will see no changes to their experience, as all new features are confined to the Updates tab that can be deactivated in the settings.
articles.content:
SAN FRANCISCO: WhatsApp announced Monday (Jun 16) it will introduce its boldest advertising features yet, marking a significant shift for the messaging platform that has largely remained ad-free since its launch.

articles.description: The star, who was married to Fawlty Towers star Prunella Scales for over 60 years, died peacefully with his family around him at a care home in November aged 90.

articles.description: Britain's Dan Evans makes an impressive start at Queen's by beating world number 13 Frances Tiafoe 7-5 6-2 to reach the last 16.
